about_the_game:
REDLINE SKIN by Redline Industries

Introducing the Redline Skin by Redline Industries, a private company dedicated to delivering weapon skins reflecting their distinct style. Embracing an exquisite fusion of black and red, Redline Industries' signature theme offers a beautiful combination. Each firearm bears the trademark of the brand with unique red line patterns etched across its surface. The sleek black metal base aids in seamless integration within the dark environment of Zero Hour's close-quarters combat, providing a stealthy edge. With the vibrant red finish, this skin provides a premium look and captures attention, especially in well-lit conditions. Elevate your weapon's style with Redline Skin, balancing functionality and eye-catching aesthetics to truly stand out on the battlefield.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.
